ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces, 1/2 cup plain yogurt,2 tablespoons butter,1 onion, diced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, 1 can (14 oz) tomato sauce, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 teaspoons garam masala, 1 teaspoon turmeric, Salt and pepper, to taste
cooking_method: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt for at least 30 minutes. 2. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger and cook until onions are translucent. 3. Add marinated chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides. 4. Add tomato sauce, garam masala, turmeric, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Simmer for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. 5. Add heavy cream to the skillet and stir to combine. Simmer for an additional 5-10 minutes, until the sauce has thickened. 6. Serve with rice and naan.

ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas, drained and rinsed, 1 onion, diced,3 cloves garlic, minced,1 tablespoon grated ginger,  1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 1/2 teaspoon cumin,1/2 teaspoon coriander, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric,1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper,Salt, to taste
cooking_method: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.Add onion, garlic, and ginger and cook until onions are translucent.Add cauliflower and potatoes to the skillet and stir to coat in the oil.Add tomatoes and cook until they have broken down and the mixture is thick.Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, cayenne pepper, and salt to the skillet. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.Reduce heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.Serve hot with rice and naan. and ginger and cook until onions are translucent. 2. Add tomatoes and cook until they have broken down and the mixture is thick. 3. Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, cayenne pepper, and salt to the skillet. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. 4. Add chickpeas to the skillet and stir to coat in the spice mixture. 5. Cook for 10-15 minutes, until the chickpeas are heated through and the sauce has thickened. 6. Serve with rice and naan.

ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, cut into bite-sized florets,3 potatoes, peeled and cubed,1 onion, diced,3 cloves garlic, minced,1 tablespoon grated ginger,2 tomatoes, diced,1 teaspoon cumin,1 teaspoon coriander,1/2 teaspoon turmeric,1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper,Salt, to taste

Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.Reduce heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.Serve hot with rice and naan.
